messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-d2-size-selector custom node?
The ComfyUI-d2-size-selector custom node allows users to easily call and set image size presets.
How can you configure the settings for ComfyUI-d2-size-selector?
You can configure the settings for ComfyUI-d2-size-selector by editing the included `config.yaml` file.
From which existing custom node was ComfyUI-d2-size-selector derived?
ComfyUI-d2-size-selector was derived from the `CR AspectRatio` custom node in Comfyroll Studio.
What is the purpose of the 'width' and 'height' options in ComfyUI-d2-size-selector?
The 'width' and 'height' options in ComfyUI-d2-size-selector are used to set the image size when the 'preset' option is set to 'custom'.
What does the 'swap_dimensions' option in ComfyUI-d2-size-selector do?
The 'swap_dimensions' option in ComfyUI-d2-size-selector swaps the width and height of the image size.
What is the function of the 'prescale_factor' option in ComfyUI-d2-size-selector?
The 'prescale_factor' option in ComfyUI-d2-size-selector changes the image size by the specified scale factor.
How can you define custom image size presets in the `config.yaml` file for ComfyUI-d2-size-selector?

You can define custom image size presets in the `config.yaml` file for ComfyUI-d2-size-selector by specifying a 'preset name' along with the corresponding 'width' and 'height' pixel values under the 'size_dict' section.
